list1_SourceName.SourceName:
Source Emissions | Fugitive Emissions - On campus Data from BruinBuy query. SF6 from BruinBuy query (113.9 lbs SF6) and gas-insulated switchgear report from electricians (42.1 lbs SF6).
GHG mt PFC-318 (C4F8) 0.173056089 CO2 10.08141514 SF6 0.070760352

Source Emissions | Fugitive Emissions - On campus (SEM) Estimated using purchase data from BruinBuy query. Estimate was based on multiplying dollars spent on gas with unknown quantities by quantity/dollar for known quantities. E.g. if a 20 lb tank of CO2 was purchased for $20, and another line item simply said "CO2" with no explicit quantity, the cost of the CO2 would be multiplied by the average lb/$ for all known quantities.
GHG mtCO2e CO2 3.780799432 PFC 0.056623071

Source Emissions | Purchased Electricity - Market Based - LADWP 104,510,905 kWh (Purchased) - 11,191,000 kWh (REC's) = 93,319,905 market-based kWh.
2016 DWP-specific emission factor of 838 lb CO2e/MWh from Cindy Parsons, LADWP Environmental Affairs

Estimated using purchase data from BruinBuy query. Estimate was based on multiplying dollars spent on gas with unknown quantities by quantity/dollar for known quantities. E.g. if a 20 lb tank of CO2 was purchased for $20, and another line item simply said "CO2" with no explicit quantity, the cost of the CO2 would be multiplied by the average lb/$ for all known quantities.
Source Emissions | Stationary Combustion - On campus buildings Natural gas for on-campus buildings with direct SoCalGas connections.

list1_SourceName.SourceName: Source Emissions | Fugitive Emissions - Off campus SEM: CO2e total calculated by applying the fugitive emissions of campus (known square footage and known fugitive emissions) to off-campus square footage for which fugitive emission data is lacking.
Source Emissions | Purchased Electricity - Location Based - LADWP & SCE

Source Emissions | Purchased Electricity - Location Based - LADWP & SCE (SEM) SEM: kWh total calculated by applying the EUI of known square footage (buildings with utility data) to square footage for which utility data is lacking within each utility provider's region (i.e. EUI was calculated separately for SCE and DWP buildings).
Source Emissions | Purchased Electricity - Market Based - LADWP LADWP-specific emissions factor of 838 lbs CO2e/MWh provided by Cindy Parsons of LADWP Environmental Affairs.
